system.description:
Repair: the ability to maintain, repair and build mechanical and electronic devices of all sorts. This skill also covers lockpicking, both mechanical and electronic. Ship-specific systems are handled by the Engineering skill, and Computers covers the use of electronic devices.

Examples: throw Repair/INT 6+ to repair a damaged vehicle at a workshop. Throw Repair/END 8+ to do the same repairs, but in one night. Throw Repair/EDU 8+ to restore a vehicle that is no longer functioning. For all these tasks, the character will need an ample supply of parts.
system.shortdescr: Maintain, repair and build mechanical and electronic devices
